talk.utter:
We collectively tried this approach on the other site. Bit by bit the garbage took over. Because whether in agreement or as voyeurs it enabled them.

Since day dot, people on Bluesky have advocated for a different approach. If you prefer the old one, may I suggest Twitter.

talk.author: did:plc:j42gs6zovmd34x4hn2mjacxq
talk.utter: I would just recommend you not worry about who I follow, and if you think I suck, block me ) but you do you.

talk.author: did:plc:kmmr7gi2dg4we3zirm5bws5m
